normalised: Hey, that is great news about solar rooftop subsidies! Imagine, finally getting those panels installed. My uncle in Kerala was considering it, especially with Onam around the corner. He has been complaining about the rupee five thousand electricity bill. Hopefully, this subsidy will help him. It is a smart move by the government. Good for Bharat!
